articles.description: That ice cream moment between Dana Carvey and Maya Rudolph during last week's SNL spoofing the vice presidential debate was completely spontaneous.
articles.content: Guess what? And by the way — that ice cream moment between Dana Carvey and Maya Rudolph during last week’s Saturday Night LiveCold Openspoofing the vice presidential debate was completely spontaneous… [+1807 chars]
